project_name: GPT Model Data Preparation for 'The Doing Better Show'
project_goal: Prepare structured data for training a custom GPT model tailored to the 'Doing Better Show'. Use detailed JSON objects for each episode to enhance content discovery, generate automated responses, and provide insights.

accomplishments.description: Structured detailed JSON objects for the initial seven episodes of the 'Doing Better Show', covering comprehensive data fields.
Developed a standard template for episode JSON objects to ensure consistency and extendability.
Created documentation to assist in understanding and using the episode data set.

example_json_object.title: The First Episode of The Doing Better Show
example_json_object.description: In our debut episode we discuss the role of platforms like Rumble and TikTok in transforming how people interact with news, AI's impact on work, and public accountability. Greg from Root Awakening Kava teaches us about Kava and its benefits.

segments.content: Discussion on the health benefits of Kava and its cultural significance.

example_json_object.additional_notes: This episode sets the tone for future discussions and introduces our audience to the show's format.
